import axios from"axios";// const baseURL = "https://glacial-eyrie-04065.herokuapp.com";
var baseURL="https://localhost:3001";export default{// Login routes for home model
getHome:function getHome(id){return axios.get("".concat(baseURL,"/api/homes/")+id);},addHome:function addHome(homeData){return axios.post("".concat(baseURL,"/api/homes/"),homeData);},deleteHome:function deleteHome(id){return axios.delete("".concat(baseURL,"/api/homes/")+id);},// Expense Routes
getExpenses:function getExpenses(id){return axios.get("".concat(baseURL,"/api/expenses/")+id);},addExpense:function addExpense(expenseData){return axios.post("".concat(baseURL,"/api/expenses/"),expenseData);},editExpense:function editExpense(id,expenseData){return axios.put("".concat(baseURL,"/api/expenses/")+id,expenseData);},removeExpense:function removeExpense(id){return axios.delete("".concat(baseURL,"/api/expenses/")+id);},// Payment Routes
getPayments:function getPayments(id){return axios.get("".concat(baseURL,"/api/payments/")+id);},addPayment:function addPayment(paymentData){return axios.post("".concat(baseURL,"/api/payments/"),paymentData);},editPayment:function editPayment(id,paymentData){return axios.put("".concat(baseURL,"/api/payments/")+id,paymentData);},removePayment:function removePayment(id){return axios.delete("".concat(baseURL,"/api/payments/")+id);},// Chore Routes
getChores:function getChores(id){return axios.get("".concat(baseURL,"/api/chores/")+id);},addChore:function addChore(choreData){return axios.post("".concat(baseURL,"/api/chores/"),choreData);},editChore:function editChore(id,choreData){return axios.put("".concat(baseURL,"/api/chores/")+id,choreData);},removeChore:function removeChore(id){return axios.delete("".concat(baseURL,"/api/chores/")+id);},// Event Routes
getEvents:function getEvents(id){return axios.get("".concat(baseURL,"/api/events/")+id);},addEvent:function addEvent(eventData){return axios.post("".concat(baseURL,"/api/events/"),eventData);},editEvent:function editEvent(id,eventData){return axios.put("".concat(baseURL,"/api/events/")+id,eventData);},removeEvent:function removeEvent(id){return axios.delete("".concat(baseURL,"/api/events/")+id);},// User Routes
getUsers:function getUsers(id){return axios.get("".concat(baseURL,"/api/users/")+id);},addUser:function addUser(userData){return axios.post("".concat(baseURL,"/api/users/"),userData);},editUser:function editUser(id,userData){return axios.put("".concat(baseURL,"/api/users/")+id,userData);},removeUser:function removeUser(id){return axios.delete("".concat(baseURL,"/api/users/")+id);}};
